sources: W.R.C.P. 5.2 (e-filing — 150 MB max as of Apr 5, 2025)

caption.courtNameFormat: IN THE DISTRICT COURT, {JUDICIAL_DISTRICT} JUDICIAL DISTRICT, {COUNTY} COUNTY, STATE OF WYOMING
caption.sampleTemplate:
IN THE DISTRICT COURT
{JUDICIAL_DISTRICT} JUDICIAL DISTRICT
{COUNTY} COUNTY, STATE OF WYOMING

{PLAINTIFFS},

     Plaintiff(s),

v.

{DEFENDANTS},

     Defendant(s).

Civil Action No. {CASE_NUMBER}

{MOTION_TITLE}

jurat.language: I, {NAME}, declare under penalty of false swearing pursuant to W.S. § 1-2-104 that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE} in {COUNTY} County, Wyoming.
jurat.federalOverride: I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.

implementationNotes: Wyoming uses 'penalty of false swearing' per W.S. § 1-2-104 instead of standard 'penalty of perjury'
First page has 3-inch top margin for court use
E-filing maximum file size increased to 150 MB as of April 5, 2025
